item.description:
We might try this restaurant for informal meetings to chat and brainstorm about how best to serve more members of our group ... with no background music, listening and talking are both easier. And if declutterers don't show up, we can join the vegetarian Meetup that lunches here at this same time-

 

Come join us!

 

(Note: The restaurant is up a flight of stairs, so if this factor is problematic for you, please advise ... if so, we welcome your suggestions of alternative venues. Thanks!)
item.how_to_find_us: Second floor- I'll put a Meetup sign on our table

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Brainfood for Brainstorming
